nodes.text: A skirmish took place in Coronet City on Corellia during the Age of the Empire. Khamus, heir to the Mourner's Wail Syndicate, hired a team of bounty hunters to infiltrate a sanctuary of the Unbroken Clan and kill a target. The team—which included Beilert Valance, Boba Fett, Bossk, Nakano Lash, and T'ongor—successfully defeated the guards surrounding the facility, but were forced to retreat when Lash gunned Khamus down after the client eliminated their target.
